description: This circular loop walk takes you up to the Minaun Heights near Dooagh on Achill Island in County Mayo. The popular hike takes you up to a 466 metres high viewpoint with incredible views over Achill Island, Blacksod Bay and Clare Island. You can start the walk from the car park at Keel Beach where there are great views up to the cliffs. From here you can pick up footpaths heading south east up to the cliffs. You can continue your walking in the area by visiting the beautiful beach at the horseshoe-shaped Keem Bay or by picking up the Dooagh Loop Walk .
